about_the_game:
Chained bean is action game with little bit of horror element, where your enemy is bouncy ball

Controlls: A -Move Left, D - Move Right, X - Shoot

You will explore the hounted house where your brother was lost.
You will use your chain to fight enemies.
2D action game where your enemy is a ball that bounce off the walls and you need to shoot it with your chain.
But when you do that, enemy can split. You need to defeat all of them and save your brother from dephts of haunted house





It was Halloween night, and the two cucumber siblings, Larry and Laura, were visiting an old mansion. Laura was too scared to go inside, so Larry went in by himself.


Larry explored the mansion, but he soon heard a strange voice calling him. He followed the voice, and it led him to a dark room. In the middle of the room was a white, round face with no eyes or mouth, just black holes.


The face was terrifying, and Larry screamed. "Help me!". His little sister heard him, and she ran into the mansion to help him.

name: Chained Cucumber

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX750ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Chained bean is action game with little bit of horror element , where your enemy is very boncy
